segment.source: Configuring MED-V Workspace Policies
segment.target: Configuring MED-V Workspace Policies

segment.source: Configuring MED-V Workspace Policies
segment.target: Configuring MED-V Workspace Policies

segment.source: Configuring MED-V Workspace Policies
segment.target: Configuring MED-V Workspace Policies

segment.source: A MED-V workspace policy is a group of configurable settings that define how the virtualized environment and applications perform on the host machine.
segment.target: A MED-V workspace policy is a group of configurable settings that define how the virtualized environment and applications perform on the host machine.

segment.source: The topics in this section describe all the configurable settings in the MED-V workspace policy as well as how these settings influence the MED-V workspace.
segment.target: The topics in this section describe all the configurable settings in the MED-V workspace policy as well as how these settings influence the MED-V workspace.

segment.source: The following MED-V workspace types are available:
segment.target: The following MED-V workspace types are available:

segment.source: Persistent—In a persistent MED-V workspace, all changes and additions the user makes to the MED-V workspace are saved in the MED-V workspace between sessions.
segment.target: Persistent—In a persistent MED-V workspace, all changes and additions the user makes to the MED-V workspace are saved in the MED-V workspace between sessions.

segment.source: Additionally, a persistent MED-V workspace is generally used in a domain environment.
segment.target: Additionally, a persistent MED-V workspace is generally used in a domain environment.

segment.source: Revertible—In a revertible MED-V workspace, at the completion of each session (that is, when the MED-V workspace is stopped), the MED-V workspace reverts to its original state during deployment.
segment.target: Revertible—In a revertible MED-V workspace, at the completion of each session (that is, when the MED-V workspace is stopped), the MED-V workspace reverts to its original state during deployment.

segment.source: No changes or additions that the user made are saved on the MED-V workspace between sessions.
segment.target: No changes or additions that the user made are saved on the MED-V workspace between sessions.

segment.source: A revertible MED-V workspace cannot be used in a domain environment.
segment.target: A revertible MED-V workspace cannot be used in a domain environment.

segment.source: It is important to decide on the type of MED-V workspace you are creating before deploying the MED-V workspace, because it is not recommended to reconfigure the type of MED-V workspace after a policy has been deployed to users.
segment.target: It is important to decide on the type of MED-V workspace you are creating before deploying the MED-V workspace, because it is not recommended to reconfigure the type of MED-V workspace after a policy has been deployed to users.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: When configuring a policy, a warning symbol appears next to mandatory fields that are not filled in.
segment.target: When configuring a policy, a warning symbol appears next to mandatory fields that are not filled in.

segment.source: If a mandatory field is not filled in, the symbol appears on the tab as well.
segment.target: If a mandatory field is not filled in, the symbol appears on the tab as well.
